$schema.description: The JSON schema to validate this journal entry against.

date.description: The date you brewed this coffee, formatted as 'MM/DD/YYYY'.

coffee.description: The coffee beans used in your brew.

water.description: The water used in your brew.

method.description: The method used to brew your coffee, such as 'Chemex' or 'Hario V60'.

grinder.description: The grinder make and model you used, such as 'Hario Skerton' or 'Baratza Encore'.

equipment.description: The equipment used to make this brew.

weight.description: The weight of the bloom water in grams, such as '50g'.

time.description: The total time from your initial pour on dry grounds to the next pour.

bloom.description: The bloom settings you brewed with.

notes.description: Any notes on techniques used for your brew.

recipe.description: The techniques you used to brew.

time.description: The total time from beginning of bloom until a steady stream suddenly falters to separate drops, such as '2:54'.

aroma.description: The smell (low to high), such as 'caramel', 'peach', or 'chocolate'.

acidity.description: The fruitiness (low to high), such as 'tart', 'crisp', or 'mellow'. Usually indicated by puckering/drying of the tongue or salivation.

sweetness.description: The sweetness (low to high), such as 'mild', 'deep', or 'rich'. Usually indicated by how 'rounded' the fruit quality is.

body.description: The texture or mouthfeel (light to heavy), such as 'watery', 'silky', 'syrupy', or 'creamy'.

finish.description: The aftertaste (short to long), such as 'quick', 'lingering', or 'clean'. Don't rush this aspect.

notes.description: Any notes about this brew, such as drawdown or overall flavor.

score.description: On a scale of 1 to 10, how much did you enjoy this brew?

actionItem.description: Any variables to change on the next brew.
